author: andschwa
body: Instead of half-running PowerShell with -noninteractive (and expecting the user debugging to enter more arguments), the latest stable version of VS Code allows us to launch an external console. This requires either Gnome Terminal or xterm (sadly not Xfce Terminal), but given either (and xterm is almost always available to install), we can now launch an interactive PowerShell session to debug.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: Cool - this is better than attaching.  LGTM as long as this doesn't require the experimental builds.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Yup tested out with the regular provided download.

title: Enable external console for VS Code debugging
